about_the_game:
Hello! Welcome to the Season: A Letter to the Future Recording Tools Demo!

While the full experience includes choice-heavy narrative scenes with other characters, this demo focuses on the recording tools gameplay. We drop you in at Chapter 3 of the story, the first time you use your tools. We hope you enjoy this hands-on experience of the warmly fading world of Season.

Please note: This demo is only playable with a controller. The final version will support mouse and keyboard.

We'd love to hear what you think about your experience, so please join us on our Season Discord server and let us know.

Thank you!

short_description: Immerse yourself in the world of Season, a third-person atmospheric adventure bicycle road trip game. Leave home for the first time to collect memories before a mysterious cataclysm washes everything away. Explore, record, meet people, and unravel the strange world around you.
